content.question: A uniform magnetic field of magnitude <math alttext="6.0 Tesla" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>6</mn><mtext>.0</mtext><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.4em"></mspace><mtext>T</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> exists in a certain region of space. skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
